ThingDef.label: Scroll: Cure Poison
ThingDef.description:
A magic scroll. Reading this scroll will grant a magic user the Cure Poison spell. The Cure Poison spell will heal various forms of poison instantly, including food poisoning, toxic buildup, and chaos corruption. Can be learned by any one with magic talent.

Magic users can learn up to five non-lore spells in addition to the five spells associated with the lore of magic that they know. A non-lore spell can only be known once by a magic user.

After reading this scroll to learn the basics of the new magic spell, the magic user will still have to put a magic point into learning the level one version in order to cast the spell associated with this scroll.

Reading this scroll will cause it to be destroyed.
